pc_extras_clocks.description: Clocks tied to PC extras, artifact awakening, and persistent consequences created mid-session.

pc_oskern_staff_of_cinders_awakening.name: Staff of Cinders — Awakening
pc_oskern_staff_of_cinders_awakening.description: Unlock additional locked trait/stunt slots as the staff reawakens through mythic use, study, and story milestones.
pc_oskern_staff_of_cinders_awakening.completion_effect: Unlock one locked trait OR one locked stunt slot on the Staff of Cinders (GM picks based on narrative).
advancement_triggers: Use the staff in a pivotal scene tied to Clan Cindershroud legend (+1)
Meditate on a Word Wall while holding the staff (+1)
Defeat a named foe using fire magic while invoking the staff's aspect (+1)
Earn recognition from a Greybeard / master of the Voice (+1)
Survive a mythic consequence caused by your own power (+1)
Recover lost lore about Hakon Cindershroud (+1)
setback_triggers: Public scandal damages the staff's legend (-1)
pc_oskern_staff_of_cinders_awakening.notes:
[2026-02-15] Ticked to 3/6: Eye-channeling via Staff of Cinders counted as mythic protective use.
[2026-02-15] Ticked to 4/6: Legendary Eye-siphon via Staff conduit (SWS success).
[2026-02-19] Ticked to 6/6 (RESOLVED): Jyrik Gauldurson finisher in Saarthal Eye Chamber. Counts as:
  • Defeat a named foe using fire magic while invoking the staff's aspect (+1)
  • Survive a mythic consequence caused by your own power (+1)
Staff Level 2 unlocked. Rune-reveal shout: Become Ethereal (Feim Zii Gron), mastery 0/8.
